product_name: NRS Tear-Aid Patch Kit - Type B
long_description: The Type B NRS Tear-Aid patch kit gets damaged vinyl and PVC gear back in the game with a quick and easy process. Works well as a repair adhesive for inflatables, dry bags, rain gear, air mattresses, water toys, luggage, raft seals-anything that's made of vinyl or PVC. Polyurethane patches are UV-resistant, watertight, airtight, flexible and transparent, and they conform to irregular surfaces. Includes a 12 x 3 in. patch, a 1.36 x 1.36 in. patch, a 1.86 x 1.86 in. patch, 2 alcohol prep pads, 36 in. reinforcement filament and illustrated instructions. Please note that the Type B NRS Tear-Aid patch kit is only for vinyl and PVC.
short_description: The Type B NRS Tear-Aid patch kit gets damaged vinyl and PVC gear back in the game with a quick and easy process.
